description: This dashboard has charts displaying throughput, latency, cache usage, and other metrics for running llm-d stacks on GKE.

sectionHeader.subtitle: To apply the cluster filter to networking metrics, use the `goog-k8s-cluster-name` label in the filter section.

timeSeriesQuery.prometheusQuery:
group by (node, pod) ({"__name__"="vllm:generation_tokens_total"})
* on (node) group_left ()
(
    label_replace(
        sum by (metadata_system_name)(
            avg_over_time({"__name__"="compute.googleapis.com/instance/gpu/throughput_tx_bytes","monitored_resource"="gce_instance"}[1m])/1m
        ),
        "node",
        "$1",
        "metadata_system_name",
        "(.+)"
    )
    / on (node)
    count by (node) (
      group by (node, pod) ({"__name__"="vllm:generation_tokens_total"})
    )
)

group by (node, pod) ({"__name__"="vllm:generation_tokens_total"})
* on (node) group_left ()
(
    label_replace(
        sum by (metadata_system_name)(
            avg_over_time({"__name__"="compute.googleapis.com/instance/gpu/throughput_rx_bytes","monitored_resource"="gce_instance"}[1m])/1m
        ),
        "node",
        "$1",
        "metadata_system_name",
        "(.+)"
    )
    / on (node)
    count by (node) (
      group by (node, pod) ({"__name__"="vllm:generation_tokens_total"})
    )
)

sectionHeader.subtitle: Monitor the health and performance of llm-d-inference-scheduler

timeSeriesQuery.prometheusQuery: sum by (error_code, model_name, target_model_name) (rate(inference_model_request_error_total[${__interval}])) or on() vector(0)

widget.title: Decode TTFT (Time To First Token Latency)
